name: E-commerce Platform
description: Complete project plan for building an online store or marketplace

phases.name: Phase 1: Core Shopping Experience
phases.description: Essential features for browsing and purchasing

issues.title: Build product catalog and listing pages
issues.body:
## Description
Create product browsing and listing functionality.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Product detail pages
- [ ] Product images gallery
- [ ] Variants (size, color, etc.)

## Technical Notes
- Image optimization
- SEO-friendly URLs
- Responsive design
